tool_description: Determines retrograde motion status of planets by analyzing their apparent motion relative to background stars over a specified time period.

planet_names.description: Names of planets corresponding to positions

reference_datetime.description: Reference date and time for retrograde calculation

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze motion (1-30)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: planetary_positions and planet_names must have equal length.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 1 and 30.
Sun/Moon retrograde error: Sun and Moon cannot be retrograde - exclude from analysis.
Invalid planet name: Use standard planet names (Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto).
Calculation error: Unable to determine retrograde status for given parameters.
usage: Provide planetary_positions with corresponding planet_names and reference_datetime. Optionally set analysis_period_days. Returns retrograde status for each planet.

retrograde_status.description: Array of retrograde status (true/false) for each planet

retrograde_planets.description: Names of planets currently in retrograde motion
